title: ToneBoosters All Plugins Bundle v3.0.8 MacOSX-R2R [ATOM]
description:
Description:
ToneBoosters audio plugins are based on more than a decade of scientific research and product development in the areas of digital signal processing and auditory perception.
We combine advanced signal processing techniques and highly-optimized cross-platform implementations with simple-to-use interfaces to optimize your workflow.We strive for both affordability as well as quality rather than settling for compromises and trade-offs, introducing professional-grade products to a broad range of users.


All Plugins:
TB Barricade CM:
Transparent, mastering-grade brickwall limiter that comes free with Computer Music magazine issue 199 (Dec 2013).
Read more

TB Ferox:
Add the warmth and punch of analog tape right within your audio workstation - with TB Ferox tape simulator plugin.
Read more

TB Module:

Read more

TB BusCompressor:
High-quality, transparent dynamics processor with adjustable knee and auto-release functionality suitable for single tracks as well as complex mixes.
Read more

TB FlX:
Dynamic equalizer Ã¢â‚¬â€œ blending flexible dynamics processing and spectrum equalization in one optimized plugin.
Read more

TB ReelBus:
Authentic analog tape simulation plugin carefully modeled after legendary Japanese and Swiss reel-to-reel recorders.
Read more

TB EBULoudness:
Stereo and multi-channel loudness measurement plugin compliant with ITU-R BS.1770, EBU R-128, EBU TechRep. 3341, 3342 and ATSC A/85.
Read more

TB Barricade:
Transparent, mastering-grade brickwall limiter with k system peak/RMS meters and EBU R128 / ITU-R BS.1770 compliant ISP/true-peak limiting.
Read more

TB TimeMachine:
Revisit the 4 or 8 bit era and re-create the characteristic sound of 12 bit samplers with TB TimeMachine.
Read more

TB Equalizer:
Analyze and modify the spectral balance with TB Equalizer Ã¢â‚¬â€œ a versatile EQ with digital and analog filter prototypes.
Read more

TB Isone:
A virtual monitoring setup with adjustable speakers and room acoustic properties Ã¢â‚¬â€œ right from your headphones!
Read more

TB DeEsser:
Reduce excess sibilance from vocals, or apply smooth and natural limiting of high frequencies of stereo mixes with TB DeEsser.
Read more

TB Gate:
Reduce any unwanted background noise or create that legendary gated reverb with your reverb of choice and TB Gate.
Read more

TB Reverb:
Simulate any acoustic environment Ã¢â‚¬â€œ from a small room to a warm and dense concert hall with TB Reverb.
Read more

TB Compressor:
Get any audio dynamics under control with TB Compressor Ã¢â‚¬â€œ a versatile and advanced VST dynamic range compressor.


What's New in Version 3.0.8:
-Improved support for low sample rates (< 44.1 kHz)
-Resolved a bug when typing in values while closing a GUI on OSX
-Changed right-click to double left-click to manually enter values
-Resolved a bug that could lead to high CPU load or audio not playing in specific hosts

Compressor:
-Improved mode switching behavior

Equalizer:
-Updated GUI
-Various DSP optimizations
-New auto level make-up feature for each equalizer section

EBULoudness / EBUCompact:
-Updated ATSC A/85 algorithm according to latest specification (to include gating as specified in ITU-R bs.1770/3)
-Plugin name changed to facilitate compatibility with older versions

Barricade:
-Improvement in multiband limiter quality

Evoke:
-First release
